problem.markdown:
>>True or False? The cables of a suspension bridge are connected directly from the deck to the towers?<< ( ) True (x) False
[explanation] False. The suspension cables of a suspension bridge are connected to the deck but then to main cables, which then typically are draped over the towers. [explanation]
